Anyone knows how to get the snails out of my tech-tree?

For those having problems(missing dll's, tech tree in french, etc). Here are the steps to follow to make sure things work properly:
1) Install the original skidrow civ5 release.
2) Make sure to copy the skidrow cracked files from the dvd/iso to the civ 5 folder.
3) Install the update.
4) Copy the updated crack files. 

Skipping step 2 is what is causing all the problems.

Thanks Alsn !

how do you update the game

@Torgaloukos

lol although it's been awhile if you still need to solve this....

go to the folders location i.e. "C:/windows/program flies/"

right click the folder that contains the game i.e. "Sid Meier's Civilization V"

select "properties" 

and un-check "read-only"

click "apply" 

a dialog box will appear, select "yes apply to all folders and sub-folders"

there now all the files are able to be re-written!!!
